pr_title: Fix errors and changes after importing add-ons in Eclipse

timeline.message:
Fix errors and changes after importing add-ons in Eclipse

* Add missing Eclipse project/classpath files
* Fix null analysis errors showing in Eclipse
* Remove ignored Eclipse .settings files

With these changes there are no unstaged changes and only one error showing in FileTailer (#5442) after importing the add-ons in Eclipse.

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

Fix last remaining error by updating logreader classpath

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText:
I'd rather not use it but It has issues with captures:
Null type mismatch (type annotations): required 'Collector<? super @Nullable SensorId,Object,@NonNull List<@NonNull SensorId>>' but this expression has type 'Collector<@NonNull SensorId,capture#of ?,List<@NonNull SensorId>>'
replies.author: wborn

replies.bodyText: I guess it is better than casting the return value to List<SensorId>
replies.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Casting also seems to work. They are both workarounds and I don't really prefer one over the other. ;-)
replies.author: wborn

timeline.author: cpmeister

 		</attributes>

-			<attribute name="optional" value="true"/>
-			<attribute name="maven.pomderived" value="true"/>
-		</attributes>
-	</classpathentry>
